name: In preparation
definition: Preparation of shipment is underway including packaging of materials or goods, creating labels, etc.

name: Ready for shipment
definition: Shipment is packaged and ready for scheduling.

name: Scheduled for pick up
definition: The shipment is scheduled for pick up by a nominated courier service (date/time)

name: In transit
definition: Shipment is in transit by courier service.

name: Shipment picked up
definition: The shipment has been received by the courier service.

name: Scheduled for delivery
definition: The shipment is due for delivery by the courier service.

name: Out for delivery
definition: The shipment is out for delivery by the courier service.

name: Delivered
definition: The shipment has reached the destination.

name: Shipment received
definition: The shipment has been received by an individual at the destination.

name: Lost in shipment
definition: The parcel was lost during transit

name: Received but sample missing
definition: The parcel was delivered, but one or more items were missing
